Attributes.description: An introduction to static and dynamic optimization methods with economic applications.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: MATH 200 and one of ECON 301, ECON 304, ECON 315 and one of ECON 303, ECON 306, ECON 316. (Permission of the instructor is also acceptable.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:30, Building: Buchanan, Room: D219
